item.title: 就业报告和鲍威尔讲话迫在眉睫，国债守住 4% 底线
item.description: 随着对美国经济的担忧加剧，债券投资者将从美国月度就业报告和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五的讲话中寻找国债反弹是否还有空间的线索。【原文：Bond investors will turn to a monthly US payrolls report and a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Friday for clues on whether a Treasuries rally has room to run as concern over the US economy grows.】

item.title: 美国关税冲击引发创纪录大跌后黄金走势平稳
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出比预期更为激进的关税议程后，全球市场弥漫着悲观情绪，贵金属在从历史新高回落后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady after falling from its latest record high, with the precious metal swept up in the pessimistic mood that hit global markets in the wake of US President Donald Trump’s more-aggressive-than-expected tariff agenda.】

item.title: 经济学家称，亚洲首当其冲受到特朗普关税影响，需要放宽政策
item.description: 经济学家们认为，美国新关税将通过削弱商业投资和情绪拖累地区经济增长，亚洲首当其冲，需要各国央行采取更多降息措施。【原文：Asia is bearing the brunt of new US tariffs which will drag on regional growth through weaker business investment and sentiment, requiring central banks to step in with more interest-rate cuts, economists reckon.】

item.title: 处于谍战中心的瑞波公司正就 160 亿美元估值进行早期谈判
item.description:
这家初创公司正在讨论新一轮融资，投资者将为其带来数亿美元的资金。【原文：

The startup is discussing a new funding round that would bring in hundreds of millions from investors.

item.title: 家乐福提高私有化巴西食品杂货部门的报价
item.description: 就在关键投票的前几天，家乐福提高了将其巴西业务私有化的报价，因为小股东们动员起来反对最初的出价。【原文：Carrefour SA raised the offer to take its Brazilian unit private just a few days before a key vote as minority shareholders mobilized against the initial bid.】

item.title: 全球垃圾债券遭遇 2020 年以来最严重下跌，交易商纷纷出逃
item.description: 由于美国百年来最严厉的关税引发了对全球经济增长的担忧，全球垃圾债券创下了 2020 年 3 月以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Global junk bonds weakened the most since March 2020 as the steepest US tariffs in a century triggered fears about worldwide growth.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出三个月来首次下降
item.description: 由于通胀率居高不下，日本家庭削减了开支，这表明在美国全面关税打击日本之前，日本经济的一个关键领域存在脆弱性。【原文：Japan’s households cut back on spending as inflation remained elevated, in a sign of vulnerability in a key pocket of the economy before sweeping US tariffs hit the country.】

item.title: 据说 Blackstone 正在酝酿出售 AirTrunk 的两个数据中心
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 在 12 月收购 AirTrunk 后，正考虑出售该公司在悉尼和墨尔本的两个数据中心。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering selling of a pair of AirTrunk data centers in Sydney and Melbourne, following its acquisition of the company in December, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 3月份美国就业市场在关税影响前有望保持稳定
item.description: 美国上个月的招聘情况可能保持健康，失业率稳定在历史较低水平，这表明在今年晚些时候关税导致经济放缓的预期到来之前，劳动力市场将保持稳定。【原文：US hiring likely remained healthy last month and the unemployment rate held steady at a historically low level, pointing to a stable labor market ahead of an expected tariff-induced economic slowdown later this year.】

item.title: 欧佩克+意外加息，特朗普加征关税，石油继续大幅下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税和欧佩克+决定以快于先前宣布的速度增加产量之后，石油进一步下跌，引发了自2022年以来最严重的溃败。【原文：Oil fell further after President Donald Trump’s tariffs and an OPEC+ decision to increase output faster than previously announced triggered the worst rout since 2022.】

item.title: 关税导致全球经济衰退加剧，日本股市将下跌
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税将导致世界经济放缓，全球投资者纷纷抛售风险资产，急于寻求安全，日本股市又将迎来一个艰难的开局。日元走强也可能对出口商造成压力。【原文：Japanese stocks are poised for another rocky start, as global investors dumped riskier assets and rushed for safety on concern Donald Trump’s tariffs will slow the world economy. A stronger yen will also likely weigh on exporters.】

item.title: 股市崩盘助长了 S&P 500 指数自 2020 年以来最糟糕的一天：市场综述
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的最新关税措施引发全球避险资产出逃之后，美国股市和美元遭遇了数年来最糟糕的一天，投资者准备迎接全球市场的进一步痛苦。【原文：Investors braced for further pain across global markets as US stocks and the dollar suffered their worst day in years after Donald Trump’s latest tariff measures sparked a global flight to haven assets.】

item.title: 经济学家称特朗普关税增加不确定性和经济衰退几率
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统推出的大规模关税措施本应减少企业的不确定性。经济学家表示，这恰恰相反，同时还增加了经济衰退的风险。【原文：President Donald Trump’s big tariff rollout was supposed to reduce uncertainty for businesses. Economists say it did the exact opposite, while also raising recession risk.】

item.title: 埃克森公司因价格和利润率而实现高达 27 亿美元的利润增长
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司表示，由于石油和天然气价格上涨，以及炼油和贸易业绩增强，该公司季度利润可能连续增长 27 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said it may report a $2.7 billion sequential gain in quarterly profit as a result of higher oil and natural gas prices, as well as stronger results in refining and trading.】

item.title: 因关税混乱而焦头烂额的对冲基金考虑静观其变
item.description: 对冲基金交易的狂热曾让投资银行如虎添翼，但现在可能突然接近极限，因为大投资者私下里正在琢磨华尔街最可怕的一句话："旁观"。【原文：A frenzy of hedge fund trading that has been a boon to investment banks may suddenly be nearing its limit, as big investors privately mull one of the dreaded phrases of Wall Street: the sidelines.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司抵御关税引发的股市大跌
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s stock sailed through a turbulent trading session Thursday, falling only slightly while indexes across the globe plummeted on President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariff plans.】

item.title: 特朗普关税给亿万富翁带来自科维德事件以来最大的财富损失
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布广泛征收关税，全球市场陷入低迷，世界 500 强富豪的财富总额周四暴跌了 2080 亿美元。【原文：The world’s 500 richest people saw their combined wealth plunge by $208 billion Thursday as broad tariffs announced by President Donald Trump sent global markets into a tailspin.】

item.title: 特朗普称 TikTok 交易指日可待，涉及多个投资者
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美国即将公布一项计划，使中国拥有的社交媒体应用程序 TikTok 免受美国禁令的限制，多个投资者参与了交易讨论。【原文：President Donald Trump said the US was close to unveiling a plan that would spare the Chinese-owned social media app TikTok from a US ban, with multiple investors involved in discussions for a deal.】

item.title: 共和党辩论将百万富翁最高税率提高至 40
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，共和党人正在权衡为那些收入在 100 万美元或以上的人设立一个新的等级，以抵消其税收法案的部分成本，这与几十年来共和党反对增税的立场截然不同。【原文：Republicans are weighing the creation of a new bracket for those earning $1 million or more to offset some of the costs of their tax bill, a stark departure from decades of GOP opposition to tax increases, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "金穹顶 "可以从以色列的防空系统中学到什么？
item.description:
独家揭秘以色列升级版防空系统能做什么（以及不能做什么），为美国推动建立导弹防御系统提供借鉴。【原文：

An exclusive look at what Israel’s upgraded air defense system can (and can’t) do holds lessons for the US as it pushes for a missile shield.

item.title: 越南人认为 "残酷 "的特朗普关税粉碎了经济梦想
item.description: Hoang Cuong 五年前开始购买股票，希望有朝一日能在河内买得起一套公寓。【原文：Hoang Cuong started buying shares five years ago in the hope that he could one day afford to buy an apartment in Hanoi.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储警告贸易发达的得克萨斯州增长放缓
item.description: 据达拉斯联邦储备银行称，由于特朗普政府全面的贸易和移民政策加剧了企业对成本上升、需求减少和劳动力短缺的担忧，美国第一贸易大州得克萨斯州正面临着经济前景转弱的问题。【原文：Texas, the nation’s top trading state, is facing a weakening economic outlook as the Trump administration’s sweeping trade and immigration policies fuel worries among businesses about higher costs, reduced demand and labor shortages, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 特朗普对削减关税持开放态度以换取 "惊人 "提议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，如果其他国家能够提供 "惊人 "的东西，他对降低关税持开放态度，这表明尽管一些高级官员坚持，白宫仍对谈判持开放态度。【原文：President Donald Trump said he was open to reducing his tariffs if other nations were able to offer something “phenomenal,” indicating that the White House was open to negotiations despite the insistence of some top officials.】

item.title: 关税刺激股市下跌，VIX 指数跃升至 8 月以来最高点
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策搅动全球股市，Cboe 波动率指数升至 8 月份以来的最高水平。【原文：The Cboe Volatility Index rose to its highest level since August, as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs roiled global equity markets.】

item.title: 特朗普关税让哥伦比亚咖啡价格创下新高
item.description: 哥伦比亚的 50 万个咖啡种植家庭正准备迎接唐纳德-特朗普的关税对其最大市场的打击，这使原本因全球咖啡价格飙升至创纪录水平而充满希望的一年变得黯淡无光。【原文：Colombia’s half a million coffee-growing families are braced for a hit in their biggest market from Donald Trump’s tariffs, souring a year that began hopefully as global prices soared to a record.】

item.description: 除非您一直生活在人工智能生成的岩石下，否则您可能已经听说过 ChatGPT 的新图片生成器。但首先...【原文：Unless you’ve been living under an AI-generated rock, you’ve probably heard about ChatGPT’s new image generator. But first…】

item.title: 关税影响全球增长，美元抹去特朗普上台后的涨势
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普 11 月赢得总统宝座以来，随着新一轮关税浪潮颠覆全球市场，美元已抹去所有涨幅。【原文：The dollar has wiped out all of its gains since Donald Trump won the presidency in November as a new wave of tariffs upended global markets.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，大宗商品指数创 2022 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税引发全球经济放缓将削弱对石油、金属和农产品需求的猜测之后，大宗商品价格出现了两年多来最大的单日集体暴跌。【原文：Commodity prices posted their biggest one-day collective slump in more than two years after President Donald Trump’s tariffs ignited speculation that a slowing global economy will undermine demand for oil, metals and agricultural products.】

item.title: 交易员抢购高收益债券 ETF 看跌期权作为信用对冲工具
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府的关税雪崩会将美国经济推向衰退，一些希望对冲高收益债券市场风险的交易员周四转而选择了交易所交易基金期权。【原文：Some traders looking to hedge risks in the high yield bond market, amid fears that an avalanche of Trump administration tariffs could push the US economy into recession, turned to options on exchange-traded funds on Thursday.】

item.title: 滞胀几率上升，摩根士丹利和瑞银在美联储呼声上发生冲突
item.description: 凌晨两点刚过，苏黎世，瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）首席投资官马克-海弗尔（Mark Haefele）就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新一轮关税措施发表了自己的看法。海福尔在给客户的信中写道，美联储今年将不得不更积极地降息，降息次数将多达四次。【原文：It was shortly after 2 a.m. in Zurich when Mark Haefele, the chief investment officer at UBS Global Wealth Management, gave his verdict on President Donald Trump’s new barrage of tariffs. The Federal Reserve, Haefele wrote to his clients, will now have to cut interest rates far more aggressively this year — as many as four times.】
